game.title: A Quest to Save the Kingdom
game.objective: Conquer the Dark Tower and defeat the evil sorcerer
game.description: You have been chosen by the king to embark on a journey to retrieve the mystical amulet that holds the key to defeating the sorcerer. Along the way, you'll encounter various challenges and allies.
game.reward: Royal Amulet, 100 Gold Pieces, Hero's Medal

task.objective: Visit the village of Willowgrove for clues about the amulet
task.description: Pick up a map from the village elder's house and gather information about the Dark Tower's location.

task.objective: Cross the River of Shadows to reach the ancient forest
task.description: Ferry across the river using the local guide's service and navigate through the enchanted woods.
